Sentencas: Grain boundary grooves of nickel were studied in Ni polycrystals and in Ni/YSZ (nickel/yttria-stabilized zirconia) anode microstructures of an solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) in order to determine the relative grain boundary energies of nickel.
Titulo: A thermal grooving study of relative grain boundary energies of nickel in polycrystalline Ni and in a Ni/YSZ anode measured by atomic force microscopy

Sentencas: Reliable material parameters are necessary for realistic simulations to model the coarsening of nickel grains in SOFC anodes.
Titulo: A thermal grooving study of relative grain boundary energies of nickel in polycrystalline Ni and in a Ni/YSZ anode measured by atomic force microscopy

Sentencas: However, the reported values in literature do not meet the requirements for accuracy and the experimental conditions differ strongly from the conditions within an anode.
Titulo: A thermal grooving study of relative grain boundary energies of nickel in polycrystalline Ni and in a Ni/YSZ anode measured by atomic force microscopy

Sentencas: In this work, the measurement approach for atomic force microscopy was optimized to ensure the required accuracy in measuring grain boundary grooves; the thermal grooving experiments were performed at T = 750 degrees C in dry and humid atmosphere.
Titulo: A thermal grooving study of relative grain boundary energies of nickel in polycrystalline Ni and in a Ni/YSZ anode measured by atomic force microscopy

Sentencas: The resulting distributions of measured dihedral angles and relative grain boundary energies are identical in the polycrystal and the anode microstructure and are independent of annealing time and humidity.
Titulo: A thermal grooving study of relative grain boundary energies of nickel in polycrystalline Ni and in a Ni/YSZ anode measured by atomic force microscopy

Sentencas: For the first time, precise values of the relative grain boundary energies of nickel are determined with high accuracy under operating conditions of an SOFC anode.
Titulo: A thermal grooving study of relative grain boundary energies of nickel in polycrystalline Ni and in a Ni/YSZ anode measured by atomic force microscopy

Sentencas: The mean value of the relative grain boundary energies gamma(GB)/gamma(S) of nickel is 0.475 +/- 0.013 for high-angle grain boundaries, 0.217 +/- 0.010 for low-angle grain boundaries, 0.157 +/- 0.013 for Sigma 3 grain boundaries and 0.019 +/- 0.002 for twin boundaries.
Titulo: A thermal grooving study of relative grain boundary energies of nickel in polycrystalline Ni and in a Ni/YSZ anode measured by atomic force microscopy
